creator: Charles Anderson Dana
description:
LibriVox recording of Recollections of the Civil War by Charles Anderson Dana.
Read in English by Jennifer Dorr; Larry Wilson; Denise Nordell; Savannah; Ernst Schnell; jabc1950; Ravi Shankar; KHand; Lynne Thompson; asterix; sbnelson; Paul Simonin; Zachary Brewster-Geisz; Greg Giordano
Recollections of the Civil War records the events that took place during the American Civil war. It forms one of the most remarkable volumes of historical, political, and personal reminiscences which have been given to the public. Mr. Dana wrote these Recollections of the civil war according to a purpose which he had entertained for several years. They were completed only a few months before his death on October 17, 1897. Go to the e-book on this book's catalog page for some great illustrations and an index. (Summary by Preface and WoollyBee)
For further information, including links to M4B audio book, online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;politics; history; civil war
